pages.text: $(bold)I don't like the caves / frequencies of certain things / the balancing. Can you do something about 'x'?$()$(br2)Yes, I can. If you’re not rude about it, I’ll customize some of your settings to your liking so you can enjoy my modpack to its fullest potential. Though, I do plan on balancing tons of things in the future, so either feel free to ask for
some small changes to your game or be patient for updates!
